data_structures: no explicit data structures beyond input array
algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, keeping track of the effective index and deleting elements that violate the beauty condition.
problem_summary_simple: Delete minimum elements to make an array beautiful (even length, alternating elements).
problem_summary_technical: Greedily iterates through the array, maintaining an effective index, and counts deletions needed to satisfy the even-length and alternating element conditions.
key_insights: The 'beautiful' condition applies to pairs of elements at even indices.
A greedy approach works by iterating and fixing violations as they occur.
The final length of the array must be even, so an extra deletion might be needed if the remaining count is odd.
